metadata.title: CVE-2019-19722 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Dovecot before 2.3.9.2, an attacker can crash a push-notification driverwith a crafted email when push notifications are used, because of a NULLPointer Dereference. The email must use a group address as either thesender or the recipient.

criterions.comment: dovecot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
